AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: wild
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] has roamed the wild for years, looking for a worthy herd to join. [PAWN_pronoun] is as mindless as most cygor, and is only capable of focusing on the most menial task.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: insane
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] has roamed the wild for years, and gone quite insane from the tme alone and the magical visions. [PAWN_pronoun] is as mindless as most cygor, and is only capable of focusing on the most menial task.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: wildling
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was born in the old forest, and grew up wild and free. [PAWN_possessive] magical sight freqently drove [PAWN_objective] to madness, and [PAWN_pronoun] still has a hard time focusing on basic tasks because of it.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: corrupted
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was born to human parents, and grew so much so fast that it didn't take them long to figure out that their child was a moster. [PAWN_possessive] magical sight freqently drove [PAWN_objective] to madness, and [PAWN_pronoun] still has a hard time focusing on basic tasks because of it.
